title: Person Of Interest : Bear's Bad Days
author: The69Observer
comment:
Bear: *hears John come into the door* Yay! *runs over and begins to tackle him*
I found that scene adorible.

Bear's friendly nature shined through even when he was supposed to be attacking an armed gunman. Take a closer look at the opening scene when Bear, John and Finch went to a lady vet to protect her from hopped up armed robbers.Look closely. Bear licks the actors face after attacking him.
Finch's laugh in the end when they are in the park and Bear is finally happy is like he's thinking "mwhaha, I finally understand the canine world!"
"Are you under stress at home?" Other than the jail cell and the bomb vest, no! What gave you that idea, Finch?

Sad Bear was probably one of the most endearingly sad things I've ever seen.
Don't get me started when they faked him being sick so he could help them on a case.
description: Bear is John's and Finch's dog, as part of our favorite vigilante team he doesn't have it easy all the time. Like any of us, he as bad days sometimes. It seems family and friends help.
